overview:
John Curtis is currently the Senior Social Media and SEO Strategist at L2Tmedia just outside of Chicago, IL.

John works to create SEO and Social Media programs that best fit the needs of auto dealerships. He has worked with more than 300 car dealers across the nation to produce SEO and Social Media projects, including large market keyword targeting, reputation monitoring and social prospecting.

John has contributed to several online publications as a guest author regarding search engine optimization topics and has served as a media source for journalists covering SEO news.

John is also an amatuer photographer who enjoys shooting Rocky Mountain landscapes and urban cityscapes in Chicago.

relationships.title: Senior Social Media and SEO Strategist
